request.description: Request the latest event notificaiton message.
Remove an event notification.  Replace {adp-msg-msgid} with the message id returned in the header of the response.

item.name: Table V1 > Codelists - Emp. Profile and Ben. Grps. (For List Name)

request.description: Exposes WFN validation table data for the **Employment Profile** tables (Business Unit, Department, Location, Union Code, Union Local, Job Title, Pay Grade and Cost Number) and the **Benefits** tables (Eligibility Class).  Replace `{list-name}` with a valid value from the data dictionary.

item.name: Table V1 > Codelists - Personal Information Group (For List Name)

request.description: Exposes WFN validation table data for the **Personal Information** tables (Learning Institution, Education Major/Minor, Degree/Achievement Level).  Replace `{list-name}` with a valid value from the data dictionary.

item.name: Payroll Instructions V1 > Gen. Ded. Instr. Start

request.description: Add a new deduction or restart an existing deduction that has been previously stopped.  You need the Payroll Agreement ID for the worker, which you can get by sending a GET to the Payroll Instructions V1 API for the desired worker.

item.name: Payroll Outputs V1 (List for Region / Company Code / Year / Week)

url.raw: {{service-root}}/payroll/v1/payroll-output?$filter=payrollScheduleReference/payrollYear eq 2018 and payrollScheduleReference/payrollWeekNumber eq 10 and payrollGroupCode/codeValue eq %26Y%26 and payrollRegionCode/codeValue eq BALT&$count=true&use-cache=false

query.value: payrollScheduleReference/payrollYear eq 2018 and payrollScheduleReference/payrollWeekNumber eq 10 and payrollGroupCode/codeValue eq %26Y%26 and payrollRegionCode/codeValue eq BALT

request.description: Fetches a list of payroll outputs given a Region Code, Company Code, Year and Week.

item.name: Payroll Outputs V1 (Single  w/ Detail for  Region Code / Company Code / Payroll Job ID)

url.raw: {{service-root}}/payroll/v1/payroll-output?$filter=payrollProcessingJobID eq fdd0ff77-5772-4667-a2c4-273abb84a7b5 and payrollGroupCode/codeValue eq %26Y%26 and payrollRegionCode/codeValue eq BALT&level=details&$select=earnings,reportableEarningsAndBenefits,reimbursements,statutoryDeductions,nonStatutoryDeductions,memos,configurationTags&$count=true&use-cache=false

query.value: payrollProcessingJobID eq fdd0ff77-5772-4667-a2c4-273abb84a7b5 and payrollGroupCode/codeValue eq %26Y%26 and payrollRegionCode/codeValue eq BALT

request.description: Fetches detailed payroll output by for a Region Code, Company Code and Payroll Job ID.  Note all three filter parameters required for this request can be found in the payroll-processing.job.status.change event notification message payload.
